Hello, I'm Jiahui (Gabriel) Huang

I’m a 2nd year M.Sc student at the University of British Columnbia (UBC) with Leonid Sigal as my supervisor, where I work on computer vision and machine learning.

Previously, I received my B.S. at Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD) advised by Gemma Roig.

Scholar Github

News

  • Oct 2022: My internship project “Instant Add” is show-cased at Adobe Max Sneaks 2022.
  • Jul 2022: Layered Controllable Video Generation has been accepted to ECCV 2022 as an oral presentation.
  • May 2022: I will be joining Adobe Research as a research scientist intern.
